dcterms:description: SYSU-MM01 is a popular RGB-IR re-ID dataset, which contains images of 419 identities captured in both indoor and outdoor environments. The training set includes 22,258 RGB images and 11,909 IR images of 395 persons, and the testing set contains 96 identities, with 3,803 IR images for the query and 301 RGB images for the gallery set.
dcterms:title: SYSU-MM01

dcterms:creator: Dat Tien Nguyen
Hyung Gil Hong
Ki Wan Kim
Kang Ryoung Park
dcterms:description: RegDB contains 412 persons and 8,240 images, where each person has 10 RGB images and 10 IR images. The testing set has two evaluation modes, Visible to Infrared and Infrared to Visible.
dcterms:title: RegDB
